tag_list: software-testing, mobile-testing, mobile-software-testing, mobile-application-testing, mobile-enterprise-software-testing, mobile-handset-testing, mobile-vas-testing, mobile-security-testing, mobile-test-automation, test-automation
overview:
VINAQA is a software testing company located in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. We provide software manual testing and test automation services to worldwide technology companies. We are concentrating on mobile enterprise software testing, mobile VAS testing, mobile handset testing and mobile security testing.

We apply a special business model - BOT (Build Operate Transfer) that our clients can save a lot of money by paying salary of engineers at local rate through VINAQA. VINAQA will help to build offshore software testing team as required, then transfer to our clients. Our clients will use infrastructure, human resource, recruitment, training, legal, etc of VINAQA and pay 30% of their employee’s monthly salary to VINAQA. If our clients want to use management team of VINAQA, then management fee will be negotiated and agreed between two companies.

Please visit our company presentation at http://vinaqa.com/download/vinaqa%20llc.pdf OR send an email to business@vinaqa.com for more details.

Why do you love to work for VINAQA?

✔ Your salary can be negotiated with our clients and paid by them. This is a great opportunity for all qualified engineers to get high monthly salary. ✔ You will work with our clients directly. This is a great opportunity to learn their management and/or technical skills, their working attitude and specially English communication. ✔ You can be very flexible in working time. This is good for you to spend time for your kids and your family. ✔ You will be in perfect working environment. VINAQA provides you laptop, 25” monitor, Internet high bandwidth, telephone, nice office, etc. ✔ You will be in VINAQA family. VINAQA will take care not only you, but also your family by buying great insurance for you and your family members. VINAQA management team is considered as your brother/sister. ✔ More info: everything payment related to insurance is based on your real salary. ✔ Great outdoor activities
